mapper.update:
update rss_crawl
rssCrawlId = #{rssCrawlId}, rssId = #{rssId}, resourceTitle = #{resourceTitle}, resourceUrl = #{resourceUrl}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, resourceDesc = #{resourceDesc}, fingerPrint = #{fingerPrint}, where 1 = 1 and ${condition} and rssCrawlId = #{rssCrawlId}
mapper.delete: delete from rss_crawl where rssCrawlId in (#{ids})
